DOC.brief_summary: To everyone know , patient receive repeated caesarean section China . However , present know like postoperative pain intensity , different patient receive primary caesarean section . Thus postoperative follow-up , current study aim investigate compare postoperative pain patient receive primary repeated caesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Postoperative Pain Between Patients Received Primary Repeated Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: According whether receive repeat caesarean patient group group P group R. For maternal , standardized epidural anesthesia caesarean section perform . Then pain VAS score Ramsay score 4h , 8h , 12h , 24h 48h surgery record . And sleep quality 1 day 2 day surgery record . In addition , pain situation 1 week 4 week surgery follow .
